attributes.action: ensure that MPs pay back inappropriately claimed expenses, and that they are prosecuted where claims are found to be fraudulant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, demand that all Members of Parliament who have broken the rules in the claiming of expenses should pay back these monies in full,  including interest where applicable and additionally that they should be under criminal investigation and prosecuted where such claims are found to be fraudulent.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
